title: Breaking the news to a friend
body: so i just got a friend into playing league and at first he was only playing {{champion:22}} but recently (hes around lvl 14) he started to sell his soul to the devil and only plays {{champion:17}} and i'm having a hard time trying to break it to him that unless he stops hes going to burn in the seven hells. Any suggestions on how i'm supposed to word my pleas to reclaim his soul

replies.body: Approach this situation carefully as there is a chance his soul is already inhabited by the spirit of Satan. Make sure that you have a priest on hand during this confrontation. Also ensure that your friend is firmly tied to an iron chair in the middle of a salt circle. At this point you must present him with evidence of his "deals with the devil" and attempt to persuade him to fight against the evil within him. If this fails, the priest must be prepared with holy water, a crucifix, and an original Latin copy of the Bible from which to read in order to dispel this entity.

"The power of Christ compels you!"

"Really Jay? It doesn't feel very compelling right now."
Bless him for he has welcomed our lord and savior Teemo into his heart.  He's now... one of us.

Make him play top **against **a teemo. He'll see reason.

Kind of like that one murderer from family guy that stabs himself and realizes that he was actually causing people pain LOL

Teach him to play jungle and suggest {{champion:20}} . Once the affliction has taken hold of the child you can only wait it out until it burns away. But encouraging the disease to become stronger may accelerate this process and end his suffering and the suffering of those around him sooner, that way he can still repent and be saved by the no longer existing summoners when he refutes the ways of top lane and jungle satan respectively.

Weird, that's exactly how I started out playing League. First bought {{champion:22}}, then played {{champion:17}} almost all the way to 30.

And no.

**THERE IS NO ESCAPING THE ALMIGHTY LORD OF SHADOW. WE WILL TAKE YOUR FRIEND'S BODY AND END HIS LIFE SO THAT THE UNHOLY FATHER CAN REACH OUT FROM THE GROUND AND PULL HIM INTO THE DEEPEST CIRCLES OF HELL!!**

**HEIL SATAN!! HEIL HYDRA!!**
He turned me into a newt!
